Original:
當人的心中燃著熊熊的嫉妒火燄時，或者說出憤怒或牢騷等負面言詞時，這個人的自律神經就會一口氣產生紊亂，血管會收縮，血液會變得混濁粘稠。於是，內臟的功能便會下降，賀爾蒙的分泌也會失調，肌膚和頭髮也會大幅地失去水嫩光澤。

也就是說，一旦產生嫉妒或負面情感，自律神經就會嚴重失衡，心理和身體會出現各種不適症狀，無法激發出這個人所具有的張力。不但如此，平常可以輕而易舉做到的事情也變得不再簡單。

這種狀態如果長期持續的話，我們的心理和身體就會一口氣傾向「生病」之路。

另一方面，當人感到安心時，血管會適度擴張，血液循環變成順暢運行的狀態。當血液循環好時，不只是不容易生病，也因為有充足的血液送達大腦，使得我們的集中力增加，判斷事物的正確度也會跟著提升。

祝老闆忠於自我，店長長久久，和氣生財。
EN:
When a person's heart is burning with jealousy flames, or negative words such as anger or complaints, the person's autonomic nerves will cause disorder in one breath, blood vessels will shrink, and blood will become turbid and sticky.As a result, the function of the internal organs will decrease, the secretion of hormon will also be disordered, and the skin and hair will also greatly lose their tender luster.

In other words, once jealousy or negative emotions are generated, the autonomic nerves will be severely imbalanced, and various discomfort symptoms will occur in psychology and body, which cannot stimulate the tension of this person.Not only that, but things that can be easily done are no longer simple.

If this state continues for a long time, our psychology and body will tend to "ill" in one breath.

On the other hand, when people feel at ease, the blood vessels will expand moderately, and the blood circulation becomes a state of smooth operation.When the blood circulation is good, it is not only difficult to get sick, but also because of sufficient blood to reach the brain, which increases our concentration and judging the correctness of things will also increase.

I wish the boss loyal to himself, the manager for a long time, and the money and wealth.

Original: 位於台北市中心的非常漂亮的地下酒吧風格的酒吧。酒吧有自己的特色。座位不多，空間有點小，還有一位知識淵博的調酒師/老闆。他非常擅長調酒，點普通的東西是愚蠢和浪費的。調酒師剛剛用他的創作讓你感到驚訝（以好的方式）。即使是在一個非常低調的小巷裡，氣氛也非常高。射擊是彼此基本的交流，這使得這個酒吧如此火爆。
EN: A very beautiful underground bar style bar in the center of Taipei.Bar has its own characteristics.There are not many seats, the space is a bit small, and there is a knowledgeable bartender/bartender.He is very good at alcohol, and ordinary things are stupid and wasteful.The bartender just surprised you with his creation (in a good way).Even in a very low -key alley, the atmosphere is very high.Shooting is a basic communication with each other, which makes this bar so popular.

Original:
這是一家古色古香的酒吧，老闆很活潑，喜歡威士忌。這傢伙為我做了一個老式的，有大冰塊什麼的！
酒吧本身隱藏在一個普通的地方，入口看起來就像銀行金庫的滑動門，我看不到任何跡象。會說一點英語，但無論如何都能理解我說的大部分內容。
我的團隊感覺很零食，並點了餃子送到那裡，店主對此很滿意。他甚至給了我們筷子來吃飯。
EN:
This is an antique bar. The boss is very lively and likes to whiskey.This guy made an old -fashioned one for me, there are big ice cubes or something!
The bar itself is hidden in an ordinary place, and the entrance looks like the sliding door of the bank vault. I can't see any signs.You can speak some English, but you can understand most of what I said.
My team felt very snack and ordered the dumplings to send it there. The owner was very satisfied with this.He even gave us chopsticks to eat.

Original: 老闆和當地的調酒師有著豐富的經驗。我非常喜歡這個地方，幾天後我又回來參加第二輪比賽。如果你想吃宵夜，可以在凌晨1點前在酒吧旁邊點牛肉麵。無論如何，如果我再次來到台北，我會回來的。
EN: The boss and the local bartender have rich experience.I like this place very much. A few days later, I came back to participate in the second round.If you want to eat supper, you can order beef noodles next to the bar before 1 am.In any case, if I come to Taipei again, I will come back.

EN: Drink a glass of cocktail after dinner!There are also few local and foreign craft beer.Cocktails are made of on -site (no cocktail list). If necessary, wine guarantee can prepare some very interesting things ... It is worth a go!Mowing

Original:
藏在角落的小酒吧。以前是一棟老房子，因此室內設計非常有趣。與朋友一起放鬆和喝一杯的好地方。飲料價格也很合理，每位顧客的最低消費取決於工作日/週末。
謝謝你們的熱情招待！
EN:
Bar hidden in the corner.It used to be an old house, so the interior design was very interesting.Relax and drink a cup with friends.The price of drinks is also very reasonable, and the minimum consumption of each customer depends on the working day/weekend.
Thank you for your warm hospitality!

Original: 紅燒牛肉麵(細麵)小碗138元...兩大塊已經完全熬煮爛透的腱子肉...搭配帶有淡淡番茄香的紅燒湯頭...十分美味...另外還附上吸滿湯汁已成黃褐色的蘿蔔塊以及川燙過的小白菜...清燉牛肉麵(寬麵)大碗178元...5中塊也是熬煮爛透的腱子肉...甚至筷子輕輕一夾便可夾開...甫一上便聞到非常濃鬱的香氣...這真的是清燉?! 怎麼有一股奶酪香味?! 完全不同於一般的清燉湯頭...個人覺得應該稱為"濃燉"...幾乎是豚骨白湯一般的濃稠...入口不止是好喝而已...湯頭交織了碗中香菇片、白菜絲、金珍菇、枸杞等配料...味道深奧有層次...讓人不禁喝了個精光...而且竟然完全不覺口渴...燙青菜(捲心菜)40元...乍看之下並不起眼. ..既無搭配肉燥也沒林上油膏...僅見些許油蔥在上...但一吃之下方才驚覺一股濃濃的高湯風味...搭配著清甜的捲心菜……平凡的外表下有著絲毫不平凡的好滋味...下回想再試試店內招牌冠軍牛肉麵、鮮雞湯麵、辣雞翅等其它物品...
EN: Red -roasted beef noodles (thin noodles) small bowls of 138 yuan ... Two large pieces have been completely boiled and rotten tendon meat ... with red -roasted soup with a faint tomato fragrance ... very delicious ... The soup has become a yellow -brown radish block and the cabbage hot cabbage ... Stewed beef noodles (wide noodles) large bowl of 178 yuan ... 5 of 5 is also boiled tendon meat ... or even Chopsticks can be opened with a slight clip ... when you get it up, you smell a very strong aroma ... This is really stew?! How can there be a cheese aroma?! It is completely different from the ordinary stew soup ... Personal I think it should be called "thick stew" ... It is almost the thickness of dolphin white soup ... The entrance is not just delicious ... the soup is intertwined with the ingredients such as mushroom slices, cabbage shreds, golden treasure mushrooms, wolfberry and other ingredients ... The taste is profound and layered ... It makes people drink a fine light ... and even feel thirsty at all ... hot greens (roll cabbage) 40 yuan ... At first glance, it is not eye -catching .. It is neither with dry meat nor the forest ointment ... I only see a little lush shallots on it ... but after eating it, I was shocked by a strong soup flavor ... with a sweet roll of cabbage ... ordinary There is an extraordinary good taste under the appearance ... Think back to try again in the store's signature champion beef noodles, fresh chicken soup noodles, spicy chicken wings and other items ...
